about: Tech-enthusiast with more than {{years}} years of experience as a programmer with quick adaptation to new challenges and responsibilities. Experience of working with tight deadlines, under time pressure while ensuring quality and with agile methodologies. I'm always curious to learn more about technologies and any kind of art, I'm a passionate about music, films and sports.
